OrgName.entry: BIRLEY, FRECHEVILLE, HACKENTHORPE AND OWLTHORPE COMMUNITY SAFETY GROUP

Desc.entry: Meets every 5 weeks with the police, Sheffield Homes and other agencies to try and address local issues particularly nuisance, anti-social behaviour and traffic issues. Any problems identified are brought to the group to find actions to solve them.

ProvisionPlace.entry: Birley and Hackenthorpe Tenants and Community Association

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Every 5 weeks, please contact for further details
